author: olegnitz
msg: 1) Added list of 'nowStoring' objects to avoid infinite recursion
2) Check objectCache first to define whether the object should be created or updated:
this improves performance and works in batch mode.

author: olegnitz
msg: BugFix: batch mode sometimes were determined incorrectly
because before first Connection is created
platform.supportsBatchOperations() returns false irrespective of JDBC driver
